body:
Just recycling my first render test post. This time this one's for MC.
Tell me what you think and offer suggestions :]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yg2wjt-vwp8
body_tagged:
Just recycling my first render test post. This time this one's for MC.
Tell me what you think and offer suggestions :]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yg2wjt-vwp8
title: Render Test

replies.body:
Overall, I think the quality was good.

I can't give suggestions until you give some information:
What do you want to record? osu!, Minecraft, what?
How good do you want this to be? Quality, or FPS?

Suggestions on your gameplay:
Why are you playing a 7 minute song?
Disable Background Video; it gives too much lag for a lot of songs.
Why are your mouse buttons disabled if you're playing with mouse?
Practice streams more.
I would recommend a skin that doesn't show 300s, but that's my preference.
replies.body_tagged:
Overall, I think the quality was good.

I can't give suggestions until you give some information:
What do you want to record? osu!, Minecraft, what?
How good do you want this to be? Quality, or FPS?

Suggestions on your gameplay:
Why are you playing a 7 minute song?
Disable Background Video; it gives too much lag for a lot of songs.
Why are your mouse buttons disabled if you're playing with mouse?
Practice streams more.
I would recommend a skin that doesn't show 300s, but that's my preference.

replies.body:
Maybe use less render distance for more FPS, I recommend 4 for Pot PvP. 
Other than that you're a god. You strafed this guy so much that he couldn't even touch you for a quite long time. 
I really like your videos and hope you'll be more active in youtube c:
